section.p: If you want to uninstall the AWSROROpenStackTPS5vSphere integration software, take the following preparations:

ul.li: Back up resources and data you would like to keep. For details, refer to .
In , delete the marketable services and technical services related to AWSROROpenStackTPS5vSphere.

p.b: To uninstall the AWSROROpenStackTPS5vSphere integration software:

ol.li: Stop the app-domain domain in the application server.
Delete the bssapp and vmware databases in the database management system.
Uninstall the database management system and the application server if you no longer need them for other purposes.

section.p: For details on how to proceed, refer to the documentation of the database management system and the application server.
